column1: #Text=" Asami says : " You think this 'll do ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I like the new Team Avatar 's style .
#Text=" Police dispatcher says : " Unit two sixteen , cancel that ten fifty - eight at Harmony Tower .
#Text=" Asami says : " My dad had police scanners installed in all of his cars .
#Text=" Police dispatcher says : " Calling all units , Level Four Alert .
#Text=Chi blockers and Equalist convicts are still at large armed and dangerous .
#Text=" Asami says : " They do n't know we made the turn .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Avatar Korra , what do you think you are doing ?
#Text=Nice of you to show up finally .
#Text=Here , we captured the escaped convicts for you .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " What you did was tear up the city and impede the real authorities in their pursuit of these criminals .
#Text=I did n't see your little task force or the cops the whole time .
#Text=If it was n't for Team Avatar , they would 've gotten away .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " This is your last warning .
